contentrichtext.text: [[File:Joel Jeannot.jpg|300px|right|thumb|Joel Jeannot, World Champion 2011 in [[para-cycling]] (handbike roadrace), Roskilde, Denmark]] '''Joël Jeannot''' is a male [[France|French]] [[Olympic Games|Olympic]] [[wheelchair racing|wheelchair racer]] and ''handisport'' activist. From 2007 he started competing in [[handbike]]s, winning a lot of French championships as well as several world championships in [[para-cycling]]. At the [[2004 Olympic Games]], he finished 7th in the demonstration sport of [[Wheelchair racing at the 2004 Summer Olympics|Men's 1,500 m wheelchair]]. He also participated in the [[2004 Summer Paralympics]], where he took gold in the 10000 metre race and silver in the 4×400 metre relay. Four years earlier, at the [[2000 Paralympics]], he won a gold medal in the 4×400 metre relay.<ref>[http://erea-joel-jeannot.fr/ E.R.E.A Joël Jeannot] JEUDI 8 MARS: journée de sensibilisation au handicap. Tous les élèves pourront échanger et s'initier aux pratiques du handisport avec Joël Jeannot .."</ref> He has also won the wheelchair division of the [[London Marathon]] in 2003 in a record time,<ref>[http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport2/hi/athletics/london_marathon_2003/2944343.stm Jeannot sets London best]</ref> and finished second in the [[Boston Marathon]] the following year.<ref>[http://www.projo.com/running/content/projo-20040419-wheelchair.13ef5a481.html Van Dyk sets world record in Boston's wheelchair division]</ref> He won the [[2003 World Championships in Athletics]] 1500 m event.<ref>[http://www.iaaf.org/athletes/biographies/letter=j/country=fra/athcode=185276/index.html IAAF profile]</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Jeannot, Joel | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = French athlete | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Jeannot, Joel}} [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Olympic wheelchair racers of France]] [[Category:Wheelchair racers at the 2004 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Paralympic athletes of France]] [[Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Paralympics]] [[Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2004 Summer Paralympics]] [[Category:Paralympic gold medalists for France]] [[Category:Paralympic silver medalists for France]] {{France-athletics-bio-stub}} {{France-Paralympic-medalist-stub}}
